typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		USAF as string,
		WBAN as string,
		{STATION NAME} as string,
		CTRY as string,
		STATE as string,
		ICAO as string,
		LAT as double,
		LON as double,
		{ELEV(M)} as double,
		BEGIN as date,
		END as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> StationRawData
StationRawData derive(STATION = concat(USAF,WBAN),
		STATION_NAME = {STATION NAME},
		ELEV = {ELEV(M)}) ~> StationID
StationID select(mapColumn(
		USAF,
		WBAN,
		{STATION NAME},
		CTRY,
		STATE,
		ICAO,
		LAT,
		LON,
		{ELEV(M)},
		BEGIN,
		END,
		STATION,
		STATION_NAME,
		ELEV
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> RemoveInvalidColumns
RemoveInvalidColumns sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionFileNames:['station-data.csv'],
	truncate: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> StationOptimized
